# isRunning

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value indicating whether the animation is currently running.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isRunning: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property reflects whether the animation is running either in the forward or reverse direction. The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] only after a call to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIViewAnimating/startAnimation()] method. The value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] when the animator is paused or stopped.

## Getting the animator’s state

- **fractionComplete**: The completion percentage of the animation.
- **isReversed**: A Boolean value indicating whether the animation is running in the reverse direction.
- **state**: The current state of the animation.
